# MeshAnchor

**Structure**

A volume of space that contains a mesh of a person’s surroundings.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MeshAnchor
```

## Getting mesh information

- **originFromAnchorTransform**: The location and orientation of a mesh in world space.
- **geometry**: The shape of a mesh anchor.
- **MeshAnchor.Geometry**: The shapes that make up a mesh anchor.
- **MeshAnchor.MeshClassification**: The kinds of classification a face of a mesh can have.

## Inspecting mesh anchors

- **id**: The unique identifier of this anchor.
- **description**: A textual representation of this anchor.

## Scene reconstruction

- **Incorporating real-world surroundings in an immersive experience**: Create an immersive experience by making your app’s content respond to the local shape of the world.
- **SceneReconstructionProvider**: A source of live data about the shape of a person’s surroundings.

## Conforms To

- Anchor
- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
